content:
# Night of Libraries 2023

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/night-of-libraries-2023/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:39:56

The AGH University Main Library invites you to the second edition of the Night of Libraries on October 21, 2023
Agenda: 
Field game "Lost manuscript". 
Escape Room Exodus 2: Techno-stories. 
Sensory workshops organised by a visually impaired person. 
Chess tournament. 
Board games gameplay 

For more details please visit the folowing link: 
https://www.agh.edu.pl/en/events/detail/s/night-of-libraries-in-agh-university-main-library
